name: SS Aghios Markos
author: Kimon Papadimitriou
body:
Beschrijving

References

  • Dounis Ch. Shipwrecks in the Greek Seas [Ναυάγια στις Ελληνικές Θάλασσες]. 1900-1950 (vol. A). Athens: Finatec S.A., 2000, p. 74
  • WRECKSITE - AGHIOS MARKOS CARGO SHIP 1919-1941 [WWW Document], n.d. URL https://www.wrecksite.eu/wreck.aspx?98550 (accessed 4.10.24)
  • GrafasDIVING- Shipwreck S/S Agios Markos [WWW Document], n.d. URL https://www.grafasdiving.gr/en/shipwrecks/ss-agios-markos/ (accessed 4.10.24)
  • TOP2BOTTOM DIVINGTEAM- Wreck Agios Markos 2023 (RTL) [WWW Document], n.d. URL https://top2bottom.tech/wreck-agios-markos-2023-rtl/ (accessed 4.10.24)
  • ADDICTED2H2O- SS AGHIOS MARKOS [WWW Document], n.d. URL https://addicted2h2o.com/ss-aghios-markos/ (accessed 4.10.24)
Lengte376 voet (114,6 m)
Breedte51 ¾ voet (15,8 m)
Diepgang24 voet (7,3 m)
Tonnage4513 ton

Status

The shipwreck was designated as a monument in 2024, according to the Law 4858/2021 (https://diavgeia.gov.gr/doc/65%CE%A4%CE%9946%CE%9D%CE%9A%CE%9F%CE%A4-5%CE%A8%CE%A0?inline=true).
